mapper.select: SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_table(create_time, client_id, order_sale_price, order_purchase_price, order_profit, state, wholesale_order) VALUES(#{create_time}, #{client_id}, #{order_sale_price}, #{order_purchase_price}, #{order_profit}, #{state}, #{wholesale_order})
INSERT INTO order_prod_table(order_id, product_id, count, bonus) VALUES(#{order_id}, #{product_id}, #{count}, #{bonus})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.create_time, o.client_id, c.client_name, p.product_id, p.count, p.bonus, pd.product_name, pd.type, pd.unit, pd.purchase_price, pd.wholesale_price FROM order_table o, order_prod_table p, client_table c, product_table pd WHERE o.state = "draft" AND o.order_id = p.order_id AND o.client_id = c.client_id AND p.product_id = pd.product_id
mapper.delete: DELETE order_table, order_prod_table FROM order_table LEFT JOIN order_prod_table ON order_table.order_id = order_prod_table.order_id WHERE order_table.state = "draft"
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client_table WHERE client_id != 1
SELECT client_id, client_name, sex, phone, address, wallet FROM client_table WHERE client_id != 1 LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client_table WHERE client_id LIKE CONCAT("%", #{clientId}, "%") AND client_id != 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM client_table WHERE client_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{clientName}, "%") AND client_id != 1

SELECT client_id, client_name, sex, phone, address, wallet FROM client_table WHERE client_id LIKE CONCAT("%", #{clientId}, "%") AND client_id != 1 LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT client_id, client_name, sex, phone, address, wallet FROM client_table WHERE client_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{clientName}, "%") AND client_id != 1 LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_table WHERE product_id LIKE CONCAT("%", #{productId}, "%")
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_table WHERE product_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{productName}, "%")

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.type, p.unit, p.purchase_price, p.wholesale_price, SUM(d.count) count FROM product_table p, depot_prod_table d where p.product_id = d.product_id AND p.product_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{productName}, "%") GROUP BY product_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_table WHERE state = "approved" OR state = "unpaid_delivered"

SELECT o.order_id, o.client_id, o.create_time, o.order_sale_price, o.order_purchase_price, o.order_profit, c.client_name FROM order_table o, client_table c WHERE (state = "approved" OR state = "unpaid_delivered") AND o.client_id = c.client_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_table WHERE (state = "paid_undelivered" OR state = "paid_delivered") AND wholesale_order = 1

SELECT o.order_id, o.create_time, o.pay_time, o.client_id, o.order_sale_price, o.order_purchase_price, o.order_profit, c.client_name FROM order_table o, client_table c WHERE (state = "paid_undelivered" OR state = "paid_delivered") AND wholesale_order = 1 AND o.client_id = c.client_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_table WHERE state = "rejected"

SELECT o.order_id, o.create_time, o.pay_time, o.client_id, o.order_sale_price, o.order_purchase_price, o.order_profit, c.client_name FROM order_table o, client_table c WHERE state = "rejected" AND o.client_id = c.client_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT o.order_id, o.create_time, o.client_id, c.client_name, p.product_id, p.count, p.bonus, pd.product_name, pd.type, pd.unit, pd.purchase_price, pd.wholesale_price FROM order_table o, order_prod_table p, client_table c, product_table pd WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId} AND o.order_id = p.order_id AND o.client_id = c.client_id AND p.product_id = pd.product_id
SELECT order_id, create_time, pay_time, return_time, client_id, order_sale_price, order_purchase_price, order_profit, state, wholesale_order FROM order_table WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
